dict.acceptation: 相遇，碰见；遭遇战；对决，冲突；

sent.orig: Just encounter detention, a water soldier say them to may encounter everywhere definitely.
sent.trans: 刚遭扣押时，一名水兵就说他们可能遭到处决。

sent.orig: There was heavy bloodshed in their first encounter at sea.
sent.trans: 第一次海上冲突，他们双方都伤亡惨重。

sent.orig: My meeting with my friend in New York was not an expected encounter.
sent.trans: 在纽约遇到我的朋友是出乎意料的。

sent.orig: I think most men become a fool when they encounter a beautiful woman.
sent.trans: 我认为，多数男人在遇到漂亮女人时都会变成傻瓜。

sent.orig: SWH.com - Finally, was this your first encounter with Star Wars Droids?
sent.trans: 最后，这是你第一次接触星战机器人吗？
